title: Seminario
text:
1. F√≠sica de suelos
La f√≠sica del suelo es el estudio de las fases s√≥lida, l√≠quida y gaseosa de los suelos y de sus interacciones. La textura, la estructura y la densidad aparente del suelo reflejan c√≥mo se combinan las part√≠culas minerales y org√°nicas para forma espacios porosos.

title: Seminario
text:
library(scholar)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(ggwordcloud)
library(gtExtras)

gs_id <- "WJqqnIQAAAAJ&hl"

pubs <- get_publications(gs_id)

data_pubs_titles <-
pubs %>% 
  select(title) %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, title) %>% 
  anti_join(get_stopwords()) %>% 
  anti_join(get_stopwords(lan = "es")) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  slice_head(n = 10)

ggplot(data = data_pubs_titles, 
       aes(label = word, size = n, col = as.character(n))) + 
  geom_text_wordcloud(rm_outside = TRUE, max_steps = 1,
                      grid_size = 1, eccentricity = .9)+
  scale_size_area(max_size = 14)+
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Paired", direction = -1)+
  theme_void()

title: mapas_urbanos_stgo
text:
from ipyleaflet import Map, Marker, basemaps, basemap_to_tiles
m = Map(
  basemap=basemap_to_tiles(
    basemaps.NASAGIBS.ModisTerraTrueColorCR, "2017-04-08"
  ),
  center=(52.204793, 360.121558),
  zoom=4
)
m.add_layer(Marker(location=(52.204793, 360.121558)))
m

library(scholar)

‚îÄ‚îÄ Attaching core tidyverse packages ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ tidyverse 2.0.0 ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úî dplyr     1.1.4     ‚úî readr     2.1.5
‚úî forcats   1.0.0     ‚úî stringr   1.5.1
‚úî ggplot2   3.5.0     ‚úî tibble    3.2.1
‚úî lubridate 1.9.3     ‚úî tidyr     1.3.1
‚úî purrr     1.0.2     
‚îÄ‚îÄ Conflicts ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ tidyverse_conflicts() ‚îÄ‚îÄ
‚úñ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
‚úñ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
‚Ñπ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors

title: Seminario
text:
Proyecto Postdoctorado Ingenier√≠aUC

library(sf)

Linking to GEOS 3.11.0, GDAL 3.5.3, PROJ 9.1.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE

library(janitor)


Attaching package: 'janitor'


The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    chisq.test, fisher.test

library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)


Attaching package: 'kableExtra'


The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr':

    group_rows

# https://ideocuc-ocuc.hub.arcgis.com/search?collection=Dataset
# datos enero 2020
datos_urbanos <- read_sf("datos/sup_areas_verdes_stgo.geojson")

areas_verdes <- 
datos_urbanos %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(clase = case_when(str_detect(clase, "PARQUE") ~ "PARQUE",
                           .default = clase)) %>%
  group_by(clase, estado_2) %>% 
  summarise(area = sum(area_m2))%>% 
  ungroup() 

`summarise()` has grouped output by 'clase'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.

areas_verdes %>% 
  mutate(estado = case_match(estado_2,
      "BUEN" ~ "Buen estado",
      "MAL" ~ "Mal estado")) %>% 
  group_by(clase) %>% 
  mutate(area_p = round(area * 100 / sum(area), 2)) %>% 
  mutate(clase = paste(clase,estado)) %>% 
  select(-estado, -estado_2, clase, area_p, area) %>% 
  kable(booktabs = T, escape = F, align = "c",
        col.names = c("Estado","metros cuadrados", "%"),
        caption = "An√°lisis calidad estado plazas") %>%
  kable_classic(
    full_width = F,
    position = "center", font_size = 20
  ) %>% 
  footnote(symbol = "Fuente: Minvu v√≠a Observatorio de Ciudades UC")

                      grid_size = 1, eccentricity = .9)+
  scale_size_area(max_size = 14)+
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Paired", direction = -1)+
  theme_void()

title: Seminario
text:
library(scholar)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(ggwordcloud)
library(gtExtras)

gs_id <- "WJqqnIQAAAAJ&hl"

pubs <- get_publications(gs_id)

data_pubs_titles <-
pubs %>% 
  select(title) %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, title) %>% 
  anti_join(get_stopwords()) %>% 
  anti_join(get_stopwords(lan = "es")) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  slice_head(n = 20)

Joining with `by = join_by(word)`
Joining with `by = join_by(word)`

ggplot(data = data_pubs_titles, 
       aes(label = word, size = n, col = as.character(n))) + 
  geom_text_wordcloud(rm_outside = TRUE, max_steps = 1,
                      grid_size = 1, eccentricity = .9)+
  scale_size_area(max_size = 14)+
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Paired", direction = -1)+
  theme_void()

m = Map(
  basemap=basemap_to_tiles(
    basemaps.NASAGIBS.ModisTerraTrueColorCR, "2014-06-10"
  ),
  center=(-33.4378941,-70.6510923),
  zoom=14
)
m.add_layer(Marker(location=(-33.4378941,-70.6510923)))
